short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Check your text and writing for style, spelling and grammar problems everywhere on the web
short.ca: Reviseu la gramàtica i l'estil dels vostres texts arreu d'Internet.
short.de: Texte auf Grammatikfehler prüfen - überall im Web!
short.el: Ελέγξτε το κείμενο σας για γραμματικά λάθη στο διαδίκτυο.
short.fr: Vérifiez vos textes pour des problèmes de style et de grammaire partout sur le web
short.it: Correggi il tuo testo per stile e grammatica ovunque sul web
short.nl: Controleer je teksten op stijl- en grammaticaproblemen overal op het web
short.pt_BR: Verifique problemas gramaticais e de estilo em seus textos em qualquer lugar da web
short.pt_PT: Verifica os teus textos para os problemas de estilo e gramática em todos os lugares na web
short.ru: Проверка грамматики и стиля для текста любого сайта Интернета.
short.sl: Preverite slog in slovnične težave svojih besedil kjer koli na spletu
short.uk: Перевіряйте граматику та стиль текстів будь-де у вебі

long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
All the grammar you need to succeed in life! Enhance your writing everywhere on the web!

Grammar.com will make sure your messages, documents, and blog media posts are clear, error-free, and professional. Adding the Grammar.com extension to your browser means that your spelling and grammar will be corrected and verified on your web-based email, Facebook & Twitter, and anywhere else you communicate on the internet.

To use this extension simply select the text you'd like to verify and click on the extension icon. A pop-up window will open with all possible grammar corrections and suggestions for the selected text.

Note: The extension will not work in tabs that were open prior to installation. After installing this extension, either reload your open tabs or restart Chrome.
